title: Govt plans first carbon credit sale as FCI lowers emissions
description: The government plans to sell carbon credits through optimised logistics by the Food Corporation of India (FCI) to achieve carbon neutrality. FCI's digital transformation aims to streamline supply chain operations, reduce emissions, and cut costs, aligning with India's 2030 emission reduction and Paris Agreement goals.
